mapper.select: select * from ( select p.pid pid ,p.pname pname, p.pcno pcno from products p join product_category pc on p.PCNO = pc.pcno where p.stag like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or p.pname like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or pc.pcno like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY UTL_MATCH.JARO_WINKLER_SIMILARITY(pname, #{keyword}) DESC ) where rownum <= 15
